date_range.title: Date
date_range.description: Report date range. A maximum date range accessible through API is 397 days (13 months) from today.

start_num.title: From Date [including]
start_num.description: Number of days ago (e.g. 5 days ago)

end_num.title: To Date [including]
end_num.description: Number of days ago (e.g. 1 days ago)

incremental_output.title: Load type
incremental_output.description: If set to Incremental update, the result table will be updated based on primary key. Full load overwrites the destination table each time.
